Description: Access helps customers transform the way their business software is used, giving every employee the freedom to do more of what’s important.
Name: Access CRM

Documentation.Title: Requirements
Documentation.Content:
• Service Domain : defined in your Cyclr console under Settings > General Settings > Service Domain.
  • IP Address: see Server Details.
  • Public Key : see Application Setup.
  • Client ID : see Application Setup.
  • Secret Key: see Application Setup.

Documentation.Title: Partner Setup
Documentation.Content:
1. LoginÂ  to your 3DCart Developer Account.
  2. Select Add New.
  3. Enter a name and select Next.
  4. On your Portal Development Dashboard enter the callback URL - https://Your Service Domain/connector/callback.
  5. Enter the server IP Address.
  6. Select the Permissions.
  7. Set your Application scopes - Contacts and Orders.
  8. Select Save.
  9. Note the Public Key , Client ID and Secret Key.

Test the application at this stage to confirm that it works with your 3DCart Store.

Documentation.Title: Cyclr Setup
Documentation.Content:
• Go to your Cyclr Console.
  • Select the Connectors menu.
  • Select Connector Library.
  • Find the 3DCart Connector.
  • Select the Setup button.

Enter the required values:

  • Client ID
  • Client Secret

You are prompted to log in to your Secure Store.

Documentation.Title: Test Connector
Documentation.Content: Install 3DCart in one of your Cyclr accounts and execute one or more methods to view the returned data.

Methods.Name: Get Applicant By ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the applicant specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Applicants
Methods.Description: Retrieves applicants created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Get Applicant By Email Address
Methods.Description: Retrieves the applicant specified by primary email address.

Methods.Name: Get Applicant Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Retrieves the custom fields for the specified applicant. The custom fields you wish to retrieve must be added to the response mappings with the key as the Field Location. (example: Field Location: bonus_paid or Field Location: cVProvided)

Methods.Name: List Applicants
Methods.Description: Retrieves all applicants.

Methods.Name: Update Applicant Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Updates the given applicant Custom Fields value. The custom fields you wish to update must be added to the request mappings with the key as the Field Location. (example: Field Location: applicant.candidate_discipline_sought or Field Location: applicant.leadScore).

Methods.Name: List Applicants Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Retrieves all the applicants custom fields. The custom fields you wish to retrieve must be added to the response mappings with the key as the Field Location. (example: Field Location: [applicant].personID or Field Location: [applicant].applicantName).

Methods.Name: Get Applicant Stored Docs
Methods.Description: Retrieves all applicant stored docs.

Methods.Name: List Updated Applicants
Methods.Description: Retrieves applicants updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List New Timesheets
Methods.Description: Retrieves timesheets created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Timesheets
Methods.Description: Retrieves all timesheets.

Methods.Name: List Timesheets By Client
Methods.Description: Retrieves timesheets for the specified client.

Methods.Name: List Updated Timesheets
Methods.Description: Retrieves timesheets updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Timesheets By Placement
Methods.Description: Retrieves timesheets for the specified placement.

Methods.Name: List Timesheets By Applicant
Methods.Description: Retrieves timesheets for the specified applicant.

Methods.Name: Get Timesheet
Methods.Description: Retrieves the timesheet specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List Contact Attributes
Methods.Description: Retrieves all contact attributes.

Methods.Name: List Contact Attributes By Contact ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves all contact attributes for the specified contact.

Methods.Name: Get Person By ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the person specified by ID.

Methods.Name: Get User By ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the user specified by ID.

Methods.Name: Update Client Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Updates the given applicant client Fields value. The custom fields you wish to update must be added to the request mappings with the key as the Field Location. (example: Field Location: client.clientURN or Field Location: client.sageRef).

Methods.Name: List Clients
Methods.Description: Retrieves all clients.

Methods.Name: Get Client Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Retrieves the custom fields for the specified client. The custom fields you wish to retrieve must be added to the response mappings with the key as the Field Location. (example: Field Location: clientCustomField.clientID or Field Location: clientCustomField.clientURN)

Methods.Name: List Clients Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Retrieves all the clients custom fields. The custom fields you wish to retrieve must be added to the response mappings with the key as the Field Location. (example: Field Location: [clientCustomField].clientURN or Field Location: [clientCustomField].engagementType).

Methods.Name: List Updated Clients
Methods.Description: Retrieves clients that have been created or updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List New Clients
Methods.Description: Retrieves clients created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Get Client By ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the client specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List Saved Tag File List Contents By Client ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the contents of saved tag file lists related to the specified client.

Methods.Name: List Saved Tag File Lists
Methods.Description: Retrieves all saved tag file lists.

Methods.Name: List Saved Tag File List Contents By Applicant ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the contents of saved tag file lists related to the specified applicant.

Methods.Name: List Saved Tag File List Contents
Methods.Description: Retrieves the contents of all saved tag file lists.

Methods.Name: Get Contact Consultant User By Contact ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves a contact consultant user by contact ID.

Methods.Name: List Contact Consultant Users
Methods.Description: Retrieves all contact consultant users.

Methods.Name: Get Sector By ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the sector specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List Sectors
Methods.Description: Retrieves all sectors.

Methods.Name: Get List Value
Methods.Description: Retrieves the list value specified by ID. For example to retrieve the properties of a title object by Title Value ID.

Methods.Name: Get Nationality
Methods.Description: Retrieves the nationality specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List Nationalities
Methods.Description: Retrieves all nationalities.

Methods.Name: Get Job
Methods.Description: Retrieves the job specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List Jobs By Contact
Methods.Description: Retrieves jobs for the specified contact.

Methods.Name: List Jobs By Client
Methods.Description: Retrieves jobs for the specified client.

Methods.Name: List Permanent Placements By Applicant
Methods.Description: Retrieves permanent placements for the specified applicant.

Methods.Name: List Permanent Placements By Client
Methods.Description: Retrieves permanent placements for the specified client.

Methods.Name: List Placements By Applicant
Methods.Description: Retrieves placements for the specified applicant.

Methods.Name: List Permanent Placements
Methods.Description: Retrieves all permanent placements.

Methods.Name: List Permanent Placements By Contact
Methods.Description: Retrieves permanent placements for the specified contact.

Methods.Name: Get Contact By ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the contact specified by ID. Custom Fields can be added to the response field mappings with a Field Location of customFields.<someField> eg. customFields.myCustomField

Methods.Name: List Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves contacts updated since the last time this action was executed. Custom Fields can be added to the response field mappings with a Field Location of [contact].customFields.<someField> eg. [contact].customFields.myCustomField

Methods.Name: Get Contact By Email Address
Methods.Description: Retrieves the contact specified by primary email address. Custom Fields can be added to the response field mappings with a Field Location of customFields.<someField> eg. customFields.myCustomField

Methods.Name: Get Contact Type
Methods.Description: Retrieves the contact type specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves contacts created since the last time this action was executed. Custom Fields can be added to the response field mappings with a Field Location of [contact].customFields.<someField> eg. [contact].customFields.myCustomField

Methods.Name: Get Contact Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Retrieves the custom fields for the specified contact. The custom fields you wish to retrieve must be added to the response mappings with the key as the Field Location. (example: Field Location: leadScoreContact or Field Location: sMSStatusContact)

Methods.Name: Update Contact Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Updates the given contact client Fields value. The custom fields you wish to update must be added to the request mappings with the key as the Field Location. (example: Field Location: contact.leadScoreContact or Field Location: contact.activityLinkContact).

Methods.Name: List Contacts Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Retrieves all the Contacts custom fields. The custom fields you wish to retrieve must be added to the response mappings with the key as the Field Location. (example: Field Location: [contactCustomField].leadScoreContact or Field Location: [contactCustomField].sMSStatusContact)

Methods.Name: List Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves all contacts. Custom Fields can be added to the response field mappings with a Field Location of [contact].customFields.<someField> eg. [contact].customFields.myCustomField
